channel.title: CVE Feed for Quagga -- bgpd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Quagga -- bgpd

item.title: CVE-2018-5381|2024-09-16T16:17:27.709Z -- quagga -- bgpd
item.description: The Quagga BGP daemon (bgpd) prior to version 1.2.3 has a bug in its parsing of "Capabilities" in BGP OPEN messages, in the bgp_packet.c:bgp_capability_msg_parse function. The parser can enter an infinite loop on invalid capabilities if a Multi-Protocol capability does not have a recognized AFI/SAFI, causing a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2018-5378|2024-09-16T20:16:44.677Z -- quagga -- bgpd
item.description: The Quagga BGP daemon (bgpd) prior to version 1.2.3 does not properly bounds check the data sent with a NOTIFY to a peer, if an attribute length is invalid. Arbitrary data from the bgpd process may be sent over the network to a peer and/or bgpd may crash.
